title: The Coin Flip
itunes:title: The Coin Flip
description:
Today's tour introduces us to a fateful voyage and a plumbing problem with a haunting solution. Neither one are easy to believe, though.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
